long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension required to communicate with CIMCON's web application and client component.
It helps to interact with files on the desktop from our product. Mainly it is useful to invoke our own assembly available on the desktop to perform a certain task by running one exe which will invoke some functionality on the client side like Opening local file, identify close event on local machine.
